name: Wei Zhang 0056
content: Wei Zhang (张伟) Wei Zhang Home Biography Publications Teaching Services Pictures Wei Zhang (张伟) [CV] [中文简介] Wei Zhang, Ph.D., Professor School of Computer Science and Technology East China Normal University (ECNU) Address: B903, Science Building, East China Normal University, No.3663, North Zhongshan Road, 200062 Shanghai, P.R. China Email: zhangwei.thu2011@gmail.com We are looking for highly-motivated students with strong programming ability or mathematical ability to work with us as Ph.D. students, master students, and intern students. 研究组常年招收自驱力强的博士生（可推荐进入上海创智学院联合培养）、硕士生和实习生，尤其欢迎编程能力或者数学能力强的同学。[请希望26年入学博士生和硕士生提早联系沟通] We are also hiring associate researchers and postdocs in DM/ML/AIED. If interested, please email me with your CV. 研究组招聘数据挖掘、大语言模型、机器学习、智能教育方向的副研究员、博士后。如果有兴趣，请通过邮箱发送简历，将即时联系沟通。 Research Interests Data Mining, Large Language Model, Machine Learning, AI for Education Data Mining Recommender System, User Behavior Modeling, User-Generated Content Mining Large Language Model (LLM) LLM Reasoning, Efficient LLM, Personalized LLM Machine Learning Interpretable Machine
